mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.referee AS "referee", a.referee_id AS "refereeId", a.balance AS "balance", a.avatar AS "avatar", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.register_way AS "registerWay", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.nickname AS "nickname", a.sex AS "sex"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_info( id, referee, referee_id, balance, avatar, create_date, update_date, register_way, update_by, create_by, del_flag, nickname, sex ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{referee}, #{refereeId}, #{balance}, #{avatar}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{registerWay}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{delFlag}, #{nickname}, #{sex} )
mapper.update: UPDATE member_info SET referee = #{referee}, referee_id = #{refereeId}, balance = #{balance}, avatar = #{avatar}, update_date = #{updateDate}, register_way = #{registerWay}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, nickname = #{nickname}, sex = #{sex} WHERE id = #{id}
